abstract.text: Configuration for the user interface of the document scanning screen.
Width of finder frame border.
Whether displaying of the polygon is enabled or not.
Background color of the user guidance label.

Foreground color of enabled items in the top bar.
Whether polygon auto snap progress animation is enabled or not.
Foreground color of the detection overlay.
Version: 6.2.0

Whether the flash button is hidden or not.

Background color of the top bar.
